name: JavaScript: The Good Parts
details: A deep dive into the core features of JavaScript, perfect for developers who want to master JS.

name: Clean Code
details: This book provides insight into writing clean, maintainable code in any programming language.

name: Python Crash Course
details: A comprehensive introduction to Python, aimed at beginners and intermediate programmers.

name: Introduction to Algorithms
details: A classic text on algorithms, providing an in-depth view into computer science and programming techniques.

name: The Pragmatic Programmer
details: Essential reading for all developers, focusing on best practices, coding strategies, and problem-solving.

name: The C Programming Language
details: The definitive book on the C programming language, widely considered a classic in computer science education.

name: Biology: The Dynamics of Life
details: Comprehensive biology textbook that covers genetics, evolution, and human biology in depth.

name: The Selfish Gene
details: A groundbreaking work that popularizes the idea that evolution is driven by gene survival.

name: The Origin of Species
details: Charles Darwin's classic work on the theory of evolution by natural selection.

name: Biology for Dummies
details: A beginner-friendly guide to understanding the basics of biology.

name: Molecular Biology of the Cell
details: This book provides an in-depth look at the molecular mechanisms of life and how cells function.

name: Calculus: Early Transcendentals
details: A comprehensive textbook on calculus that covers all the foundational concepts and techniques.

name: Discrete Mathematics and Its Applications
details: A comprehensive resource for learning discrete mathematics, with applications in computer science.

name: Linear Algebra and Its Applications
details: An authoritative textbook on linear algebra, covering everything from matrices to vector spaces.

name: Introduction to Probability
details: An introductory guide to understanding probability theory, with examples and practical applications.

name: Statistics for Business and Economics
details: A comprehensive guide to statistical methods for business applications and economics.

name: A Brief History of Time
details: Stephen Hawking’s revolutionary book that explains complex topics in physics and cosmology for a general audience.

name: The Gene: An Intimate History
details: A historical and scientific exploration of genetics, covering both human and scientific perspectives.

name: The Theory of Everything
details: A collection of Stephen Hawking's lectures that discusses the universe’s ultimate theory.

name: The Double Helix
details: James Watson’s personal account of the discovery of the structure of DNA.

name: Freakonomics
details: A look at economic theory applied to real-world situations in an unusual, thought-provoking way.

name: The Elements of Style
details: A classic book on English writing style, offering advice on grammar and usage.

name: Word Power Made Easy
details: A vocabulary builder book that teaches powerful words to expand one's vocabulary.

name: English Grammar in Use
details: An essential book for anyone learning English, with exercises and clear explanations of grammar.

name: The Elements of Eloquence
details: An engaging exploration of rhetorical techniques used by great speakers and writers.

name: The Oxford English Dictionary
details: The definitive resource for anyone looking to explore the richness and history of the English language.

name: The History of the Ancient World
details: An in-depth exploration of the history of ancient civilizations from the earliest records to the fall of Rome.

name: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
details: Yuval Noah Harari’s sweeping narrative of humanity’s past, from the Stone Age to the modern era.

name: Guns, Germs, and Steel
details: A provocative analysis of the factors that shaped the modern world, including geography and human ecology.

name: The Silk Roads: A New History of the World
details: An exploration of the historic trade routes that connected East and West and their influence on world history.

name: The History of Modern China
details: A thorough exploration of China’s history, focusing on the transformations of the 19th and 20th centuries.

name: Freelance: The Ultimate Guide
details: A practical guide to starting and succeeding as a freelancer, covering everything from setting rates to managing clients.

name: The Freelancer's Bible
details: A comprehensive resource for freelancers, covering all aspects of the freelance lifestyle.

name: Remote: Office Not Required
details: A guide to working remotely, written by the founders of the popular job platform Basecamp.

name: The $100 Startup
details: A guide for entrepreneurs looking to start a business with minimal investment and maximum impact.
